捕.definition: to catch; to seize; to capture

捕俘.definition: to capture enemy personnel (for intelligence purposes)

捕快.definition: bailiff responsible for catching criminals (in imperial China)

捕拿.definition: to arrest; to capture; to catch

捕捉.definition: to catch; to seize; to capture

捕撈.definition: to fish for (aquatic animals and plants); to catch

捕殺.definition: to hunt and kill (an animal or fish)

捕獲.definition: to catch; to capture; to seize

捕風捉影.definition: lit. chasing the wind and clutching at shadows (idiom); fig. groundless accusations; to act on hearsay evidence

捕食.definition: to prey on; to catch and feed on; to hunt for food
